required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Leg Casts With Heel Off-loaded in Children
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Leg Casts With Heel Off-loaded in Children: Open Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Assess whether by placing a "custom made" splint with heel in the immediate postoperative period until removal of the cast, the rate of pain, the number of healthcare interventions to maintain the off-loaded heel position and number of pressure sores in children wearing lower limb plaster casts is reduced.

primary_outcome.measure: Pain Score on the "Numeric Rating Scale" or "Visual Rating Scale" or "Face, Legs Activity Cry Consolability" According to Age Group
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to the first 2 days during hospitalization and at cast removal (maximum 30 days).
primary_outcome.description: All scales had values from 0 to 10 where zero represented no pain and 10 the worst possible pain

secondary_outcome.measure: Numbers of Participants With Heel Pressure Sores Detected According to the Classification of the Scale of the National Pressure Ulcer Advisory Panel -N.P.U.A.P.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one time at cast removal (expected average of 30 days).
up to the first 2 days during hospitalization
secondary_outcome.description: daily number of interventions by health staff /caregiver to maintain the cast in an off-loaded position, marked on a form given daily to the family/caregiver

secondary_outcome.measure: Comfort Perceived by the Patient and by the Caregiver Using a Scale of 0 to 10
secondary_outcome.time_frame: one time at cast removal (expected average of 30 days).
secondary_outcome.description: The scales had values from 0 to 10 where zero represented no comfort perceived and 10 the best comfort perceived

arm_group.description: Splint is placed under the cast of children affected by spasticity who have to keep the heel unloaded.
To avoid pressure at the heel placing and maintaining the limb with the cast on cushions or folded sheets so that the heel is not resting on the bed plane

intervention.description: Splints have been made by wrapping synthetic bandages around a leg-foot manufactured splint padded at the heel to off-load the heel. When the desired shape has been obtained, the splint is opened and the manufactured device is removed, thus obtaining a device that is used under the casts of lower limbs.
To avoid pressure at the heel placing and maintaining the limb with the cast on cushions or folded sheets so that the heel is not resting on the bed plane

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treated by operations to the lower limbs which require immediate plaster casts that include the foot
- Treated by osteotomy, joint fusion, patella repositioning and fracture fixation
- Children with intact skin at the heel
Exclusion Criteria:
- Caregivers who cannot speak Italian
- Those who refuse to give their consent to take part in the study
- Patients with lower limb casts that are allowed to load the limb

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Between November 2014-August 2015, 57 paediatric orthopaedic patients who need a lower limb plaster cast after surgery out of the 172 potentially eligible (33.1%) were enrolled in the trial.

group.title: Splint
group.description: Splint is placed under the cast of children affected by spasticity who have to keep the heel unloaded. custom made splint: Splints have been made by wrapping synthetic bandages around a leg-foot manufactured splint padded at the heel to off-load the heel. When the desired shape has been obtained, the splint is opened and the manufactured device is removed, thus obtaining a device that is used under the casts of lower limbs.

group.description: To avoid pressure at the heel placing and maintaining the limb with the cast on cushions or folded sheets so that the heel is not resting on the bed plane standard off-load plaster cast: To avoid pressure at the heel placing and maintaining the limb with the cast on cushions or folded sheets so that the heel is not resting on the bed plane

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
